WATER.name: Water
WATER.description: Essential, both for life and alchemy

LOGS.name: Logs
LOGS.description: Useful for building, especially when hewn into lumber

HERBS.name: Herbs
HERBS.description: 'Medicinal' herbs, good for what ails ya

SALT.name: Salt
SALT.description: Makes everything taste better, even rabbit stew

BASIC_FURNITURE.name: Basic Furniture
BASIC_FURNITURE.description: Not comfortable, not functional, just barely usable

T1_HEALTH_POTION.name: Tier 1 Health Potion
T1_HEALTH_POTION.description: A barebones health potion, too watered down to use in combat, primarily used domestically for minor injuries like papercuts
